Deletion candidate as relates to legacy PFP fact find process.
Moving from Data Gathering to Ready for Suitability in the Pathway

AND( ISPICKVAL( Advice_Status__c, "Ready for suitability"), OR(
AND(NOT( ISPICKVAL( Full_Fact_Find__r.FF_Status__c , "Complete")), ISPICKVAL( Advice_Household__r.Fact_Find_Type__c, ""), ISPICKVAL(Fact_find_requirements__c,"Update Required")) , AND(NOT(ISPICKVAL( Advice_Household__r.Fact_Find_Type__c, "")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Advice_Household__r.Profile_Status__c, "Up-to-date")), ISPICKVAL(Fact_find_requirements__c,"Update Required")), LOA_s_Completed__c = FALSE ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Fact Find Needs to be completed and Checkbox for LOA's Completed needs to be marked
